section.title: What are the minimum hardware requirements?
section.p:
400 MHz CPU + 128 MB RAM
There is no absolute minimum. This is a practical minimum. Performance is a function of molecule size, window size, and image complexity.

section.title: What are the recommended hardware requirements?
section.p: 750 MHz CPU + 256 MB RAM -- Of course, more is better.

section.title: Is OpenGL or 3D hardware required to run the JmolApplet?
section.p: No special hardware is required to run the JmolApplet.
The graphics engine is a z-buffer implemented in Java, and designed for rendering molecules. (In fact, designed just for Jmol.)
